data.message: I need some help, please.  I posted a short video to promote my business, and had a song by Bruno Mars playing in the background.  I just received a notice that you were taking it down due to copywrite infringement.  First of all, I had no idea that I could not do that, but I know that ignorance is no excuse!  Are there ANY artists' songs that I am allowed to use?  Thanks so much!!

replies.message: Hey David. For questions about Pages and Ads, please reach out to our team at: facebook.com/marketing. Hope this helps! -Kate
